description: Midnight is a mage which belongs to the Oracion Seis guild, a dark guild composed of highly powerful mages whose goal is to find a power known as Nirvana, a very destructive power that was sealed away long ago. Not much is know about Midnight currently that not even the Blue Pegasus Guild, who were monitoring the Oracion Seis, have much information about him outside his name.
name: Midnight
